org.holoeverywhere.addon

Class IAddonBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.holoeverywhere.addon.IAddonBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - class which this addon can handle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IAddonActivity, IAddonApplication, IAddonFragment

    public abstract class IAddonBase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic type-specified addon holder
